notesStmt.note: End of an article signified by space - punctus - space; Halper 51 and 52 together form the complete upper two thirds of a single fol; recto contains commentary on Genesis VIII 5 לבנה - 11 נוסף. The verso starts at ibid. 13 על הארץ to 21 [הני]חוח לש[ון]. Marginal correction on Halper 52 verso (missing lower third is likely to have reached to the end of VIII 20); Halper 53 recto contains XI 28 ויתכן שאור - ibid. 31 והעד שאמר; verso contains XII 5 רכושם רב – ibid. 8 [ושניהם פו[עלים (missing lower third is likely to have reached to XII 11).
Condition: non-consecutive, incomplete; lacunae [lacking lower third?].
